game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: In the depths of the ancient forest lies a long-lost treasure. Embark on a perilous journey to discover its whereabouts and claim it as your own.
game.reward: A chest full of gold and precious gems

task.description: Search the library in the town for an ancient manuscript that holds the map's location.

task.objective: Retrieve the key to the hidden door
task.description: Head to the depths of the abandoned dungeon and defeat the guardian to obtain the key.
Explore the outskirts of the forest to find the mystical portal that leads to the hidden treasure chamber.
Overcome the traps and challenges within the treasure chamber to claim the long-lost treasures.
